message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to own this unique product.  Given its value and potential, I believe a starting price of $1,400,000 is fair. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only afford to pay up to $1,200,000. I hope we can reach an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,200,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,300,000?
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $1,250,000 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
